Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.card

Class GodPower

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.GodPower
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class GodPower
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Bean class to enable serialization/deserialization of Card's power by JSON files, and to encapsulate the Card's power properties.
Author:
AndreaAltomare
See Also:
